name: 6th International Conference on Academic Research in Science, Technology and Engineering
content: The 6th International Conference on Academic Research in Science, Technology and Engineering will take place in Vienna, Austria on 21 Jun-23 Jun 2024\. The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour of Vienna free of charge. All papers will have publication opportunities in the Conference Proceeding (with ISBN and a unique DOI number assigned to each paper) or in indexed international journals indexed with SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS. The ICARSTE will be an in-person event and will also include live-stream Virtual sessions for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn, and connect. In-Person participants and speakers will get a Letter of Invitation after registration.
